name: Are We Thawing
description:
“ An ex-detective stumbles upon a crime he wasn't supposed to know about and is now complicit in the death of a God. ”

Team: RetroKnight, AwesomestPrime8, RogueKenshi

STORY

You play as Noelle Blanche, an ex-detective belonging to the Kingdom of Winter. As times begin to change, the seasons find themselves at war. The Winter Kingdom's biggest enemy the Summer Kingdom is advancing. And Noelle never thought he himself would be at the center of this conflict...

FEATURES
  • 18k+ words, 2 hours of gameplay!
  • Light detective elements!
  • Choice making!
  • Quick time events!
CHARACTERS Noelle(You): An ex-detective. Cold to many, warm to none. Snow: The God of Winter. An enigma to most. Hard to read Briar: An ex-cop from the Autumn Kingdom. Bold and rude. The Team

Lead Artist, Programmer, and Writer: retroXknight

SFX Artist, Editor: Taylor Riley

Lead Composer: RogueKenshi
